summary: A look at the mysterious collapse of honeybee colonies in America and an exploration of how beekeeping is practiced there and around the world.
cast: Gunther Hauk|Kirk Webster|Carlo Petrini|Michael Pollan|Yvon Achard|Ian Davies|Eric Olson|Randy Johnson|Roy Arbon|Raj Patel|Gunther Friedmann|Michael Thiele|Johannes Wirz|Massimo Carpinteri|Vandana Shiva|May Berenbaum|Scott Black|Hugh Wilson|Jeffrey M. Smith|Horst Kornberger|David Heaf|Philip Schilds|Jacqueline Freeman|Ruth Hamlyn|Colin Fleay|Warren Thompson|Zan Yassin|Jacquie Berger|Deborah Romano|David Yassky|Kerry Grefig|Ron Breland|Vivian Hauk
title: Queen of the Sun: What Are the Bees Telling Us?
